I would cure cancer first because it is a leading cause of death and has a significant impact on the quality of life for those affected by it.
I would cure Alzheimer's disease because it affects millions of people and can have a devastating impact on their lives and their loved ones.
I would cure diabetes because it affects millions of people worldwide and can lead to serious health complications if not managed properly.
I would cure HIV/AIDS because it affects millions of people globally and has a significant impact on their lives and their communities.
I would cure depression because it affects millions of people worldwide and can have a profound impact on their lives and their ability to function in daily life.
